extends javax.swing.JFrame

      • serverConnectButtonActionPerformed

        private void serverConnectButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
        Triggerd when user hits the Connect button. It sets connection parameters in {@link Client) such as server IP, server port and player name Then it waits for rules and sets caret at end of document.
        Parameters:
        evt -

      • okButtonActionPerformed

        evt -
